desc: ALODERMA Natural is the home for Fresh Aloe Skin Care. All ALODERMA products contain pure Organic Aloe Vera from ALODERMA's owned and operated ECOCERT certified plantations. Our Aloe is processed within 12 hours of Harvest using proprietary SATT technology to deliver the most bio-active, fresh aloe skin care products.

layout.text: Pure Aloe Gel within 12 Hours of Harvest. Now in a larger and easy to use Pump Bottle!
